page.title: 19MINES;THE COMMUNITY-BEDWORTH
page.content: There used to be a lot of{coal-mines in Bedworth.The last one was{Newdigate {Pit}which closed in 1982.A new company has taken over the site for the next 2 yrs to get all the small,but good quality coal out of the waste tip.It uses a new process that washes the coal out of the rubbish.The council are planning to build factories on the old pit site if they can raise enough money.{MINING FAMILIES }came to the Bedworth Heath area from Somerset, Wales,Scotland & Tyne & Wear because their own pits were closing. Over the past 12 yrs there has been a continuing increase in the number of { {Asian families}moving to Cedars Estate from urban areas of Coventry.In the main shopkeepers,market traders or small factory owners.Extended families are common.Mother tongue spoken at home.Well integrated community exists.
